title: 2nd Floor Rent Controlled North Hollywood Apartment with Central Air!
posting_body: Top floor rent controlled apartment on second floor of twelve-unit garden building.
Hardwood floors, recessed LED lighting, granite counters, gas stove, new paint, double pane modern windows, and *central* air and heat.
Sorry, but no on site parking is available at this time.
$1860/m base rent, less 25% discount with 12 month lease.
6951 Simpson Avenue #10, in North Hollywood, south of Sherman Way and west of Lankershim, 91605.
We're not able to reply to email or texts.
for details and an appointment to see inside.
If we're not available when you call, just leave a message, and we'll call you back from the same number.
C R E S - No fees, no games, and only $50 per adult applicant to apply, but 700+ FICO required.
